A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am very dissapointed with this movie\, to say the least.  I came out of the theater with such a disbilief of utter crap that I just witnessed.  Terrible plot\, terrible side plot.  Plot hole galore... in my view total disregard of The Force Awakens set up.  This movie could have been so much more.  I think Disney and Lucasfilm wasted what could've been the best Star Wars movie yet.  Star Wars does not feel the same\, I strongly believe the glory of Star Wars will die in the near future.  The captivating and engaging feeling towards the characters its juat not there.  We will see what happens...   I dont have high hopes for the next installments\, the emotional suspense and expectation of what will happen next is not there for me\, not anymore.
